nodes.text: Moon dust was a powdery substance that could be found on Korasa, in the Kamino system. It had the unique particularity of deactivating cloaking shields. Because of its power, the young bounty hunter named Boba Fett used it during the Clone Wars, when he raided a Jedi Research Facility in Timira City on the planet Kamino, in hopes of stealing the Blade of Beginnings, which was kept under a cloaking shield.
